string.text: This is an ITEM test string
This is another ITEM test string
fire-proof briefcase with enclosed documents therein ...

Powerful electronic lockpick. Strangely enough, it does not seem to be an all-purpose thieves' instrument. Rather, it seems to have been created with a specific electronic lock in mind and can't be used to override anything else.
Decoder
Psi-Emission Detector
PP-4a sensor
Plastic document file. You'd need a degree in biology to understand a word of what it says.
Documents from Lab X-16
A thick pile of scientific documents. Contains strange terminology, complex formulas, and a number of strange diagrams
Documents from Lab X18, part I
Documents from Lab X18, part II
Documents from Lab X18, part III
Documents from Lab X18, part IV
Documents from Lab X18, part V
Worn manuscript in leather binding. Written by Strelok himself. Judging by the headings alone, it might explain some of the Zone's secrets ...
Documents from the secret stash in Pripyat
A heavy wooden crate with the word "Explosives" (written in several languages)
Dynamite
USB Flash-drive
Insane S.T.A.L.K.E.R.'s Flash-drive
Encrypted USB Flash-drive
Professor Kruglov's flash-drive
slightly damaged USB Flash-drive
Nimble's USB Flash-Drive
Heavily Encrypted USB Flash-Drive
Strelok's Flash-Drive
Electronic key to Laboratory X-18
Borov's Key
Mole's USB Flash-Drive
Prototype developed by Scientists to protect the wearer from mild Psi-Emissions .. It has yet to be calibrated properly for regular use throughout the Zone...
Uncalibrated Psi-Emission Helmet.

Prototype developed by Scientists to protect from Psi-Emissions. This prototype has been adjusted based on the latest measurements of psi activity in the local area, and is therefore functioning at its optimum operating potential...
Calibrated Psi-Helmet
Information on Teleports

Before you can successfully make use of a manual teleportation device, you will require the 'Moonlight' artefact. Throw the device on the ground in fron of you... a transition point will be created. The device is only good for one use, so be careful.\n A hiding place in the Dump is the best solution, as it is remote... secret. It is only possible to get there from the Swamp in the Dump...

Sakharov says that he can make me a teleportation device using informatyion found in the documents from the Laboratory. In order to build it, he also requires a 'Battery' artefact, and at least 10,0000 rubles...

Greetings, Strelok .. your old friend, Ghost here ..I have re-calibrated the entry sequence to our Hideout, so don't be alarmed .. The new Entrance can still be found here in the Underground .. I trust that you will have no troubles finding it .. you're a smart guy, after all!! \nP.S. The device for Teleport removal is safe, and secure in our Hideout...
